name: The Dark Lords Messenger [Roguelike] Text
description:
This is a Roguelike Text&Keyboard Random dungeon crawler puzzler

Your Soul belongs to the dark lord, you must deliver messeges to the minions of the dark lord, if you take to long you will suffer, searching can give you magic items or gold to trade with the dark lord, you can fight monsters to gain time and health, you can feed on maggots.

the dark lords dominion is a maze, you must map it and find your way around.
the game is completely random.
